With this version the following adaptions and improvements for Mail, Online-Speicher FreeMessage and News are released:
- performance Improvements
- design Adaptions
- when moving a mail to the spam folder or marking it as spam you get visual feedback confirming the action
- when sharing files with the iOS share functionality you can now also delete attachments from the mail you write

Additionally we fixed the following bugs:
- the 3D touch gesture works again
- the spotlight search works again
- when displaying a video in the Online-Speicher the file won't be played automatically anymore

- If you have feature requests or suggestions, we'd like to hear from you. Just send us feedback by tapping the info button in the app's side menu and then selecting Feedback from the list.

This version contains a bugfix that has led to crashes on startup of our app.
The app now takes advantage of the entire iPhone X display. Additionally, this version contains performance improvements to stop the app from freezing, together with fixes for several bugs and improvements to different parts of the app. If you have feature requests or suggestions, we'd like to hear from you. Just send us feedback by tapping the Info button in the app's side menu and then selecting Feedback from the list. You can also contact us directly via mobile-apps@1und1.de.

With this version the following adaptions and improvements for Mail, Online-Speicher, FreeMessage and News are released:
- the HEIC format will now automatically be converted when adding it as an attachment
- the editing of the folderlist was improved
- when editing the maillist the number of selected mails is displayed at the top of the screen
- removal of the Watch Extension - you will still be able to receive notifications and use actions
- the account order will now be saved which avoids a change in the order when updating

Additionally we fixed the following bugs:
- displaying mails twice
- displaying of unread mails in your outbox although the outbox does not have any unread mails
- iPhone X fixes concerning the "safe area"
- when opening a FreeMessage Notification the side menu is not opened anymore
- the FreeMessage Tab will display the badge icon again and the unread messages can clearly be distinguished from read messages

- If you have feature requests or suggestions, we'd like to hear from you. Just send us feedback by tapping the info button in the app's side menu and then selecting Feedback from the list.

With this version the following adaptions and improvements for Mail, Online-Speicher, FreeMessage and News are released:
- We reworked the suggestions that are displayed when adding recipients while writing a new mail. Now, new recipients are added to our suggestion list automatically and will be visible the next time you compose an email.
- We updated the FreeMessage settings.
Additionally, we fixed the following bugs:
- Some of our users complained about being logged out automatically. This should not happen any more. If it does, please send us feedback and do include information about when this typically happens.
- When closing a video, the app sometimes did not stop playing the video's audio. This has been fixed.
- Occasionally, the video controls were missing when playing a video. This should be fixed in this version.
- If you have feature requests or suggestions, we'd like to hear from you. Just send us feedback by tapping the info button in the app's side menu and then selecting Feedback from the list.

This version contains the following updates and improvements to Mail, File Storage, FreeMessage and News:

- You can now send us feedback even more easily using the feedback button located directly in the side menu
- We redesigned the File Storage share screen
- When uploading HEIF files to your File Storage, you're now free to decide whether you want to upload the originals or convert to JPEG
- Design updates

Additionally, we fixed the following bugs:

- Tapping an email address within the app now opens the "write mail" screen
- Performance improvements

This version contains the following updates and improvements to Mail, File Storage, FreeMessage and News:
- We now support the group feature. Send mails to already existing groups by typing the group name into the "to", "cc" or "bcc" line when writing a mail
- Adaption of the swipe gesture: mark mails as read or unread when swiping a mail from left to right in your mailliste. The functionality of moving a mail by performing this swipe gesture is not lost but can be used by doing a long-press on the respective mail in your maillist.

Additionally, we fixed the following bugs:
- When opening a notification the navigation and toolbar should not disappear anymore
- A glitch when using the search functionality in our File Storage was fixed as well

version_name: erhalten Sie u.a. folgende Bugfixes für die Bereiche Mail

version_description:
With this version you get the following new features for Mail, Online-Speicher and News:

- The search has been improved and now searches directly on the server without further clicks.
- In case your inbox is too full, the app will notify you in time so you won't miss any mail.

Furthermore the following bugs have been fixed:

- The scrolling in a HTML mail has been improved and the mail is now displayed again when scrolling.

We are grateful for any feedback. If you have any wishes or suggestions, you can easily reach us in the app via the "Feedback" option in the side menu.

Following new features are added:
- The WEB.DE Mail App can now be selected as the default-mail-app. To do this, simply select the WEB.DE app in the settings app of your mobile device and then place a check mark under "Default-Mail-App".
Note: iOS still has a bug where the feature is not applied in Safari, but it already works in, e.g. WhatsApp and your Contacts app.
- You can now finally add attachments directly from the iOS "Files" app. Just click on the paper clip icon in "Write Mail" and the option is available.
- Sorting and status of each section (Folder, Filter & Smart Mailbox) are now saved and will remain even if you log out.

The following bugs have been fixed:
- The error that "Mail is being sent" is sometimes displayed endlessly and a mail is "stuck" in the outbox although it has already been sent should no longer occur.
- The search on the server should now work again.

We are grateful for any feedback. If you have any wishes or suggestions, you can easily reach us in the app via the side menu using the "Feedback" option.

Finally it's here: The WEB.DE app shines in Dark Mode!
From now on you can use the app in dark mode if you set the appearance to "Dark" in the settings of your mobile device in the menu item "Display & Brightness".
We would be pleased to receive feedback on this, should you notice anything unusual.

The lower option bar of the email view has been re-designed to find options such as "Reply", "Move" and many others, more easily.

Among other things, the following errors have been fixed:
- An error was fixed which caused the app to crash when deleting all emails in the inbox.
